int: 4B=32b
	-2147483648–2147483647
short int: 2B=16b
	-32768–32767
long int: 8B=64b
	-9223372036854775808–9223372036854775807
uint: 4B=32b
	0–4294967295
short uint: 2B=16b
	0–65535
long uint: 8B=64b
	0–18446744073709551615

float 4B=32b
	-~1e30 to ~1e30
double 8B=64b
	-1.7e308 to 1.7e308
